content: wrap yourself in softness and bold color contrasts with this modern two-color brioche cowl designed to highlight rhythmic texture and graphic vertical columns the colorblock brioche cowl brings out the best of brioche stitch squishy reversible and endlessly cozy worked in the round from the bottom up this cowl features clean blocks of color that shift as you change yarns making it a playful and satisfying knit choose vibrant shades for a striking look or go subtle and tonal for effortless everyday wear either way the color transitions create a piece that stands out without being complicated perfect for intermediate knitters or adventurous beginners looking to explore brioche in a manageable project the generous height allows styling options wrap it close for extra warmth or let it drape for a relaxed chic look whether you re knitting a gift or treating yourself this project promises a beautiful result and a relaxing meditative knitting experience
